text: Shane Paul Gibson (February 21, 1979 - April 15, 2014) was an American musician. He was best known as guitarist of Korn and stOrk. He was also a member Jonathan Davis and the SFA and L. Shankar. He was born in Houma, Louisiana and raised in Fort Walton Beach, Florida. Gibson died due to complications from a blood clotting disorder on April 15, 2014 at a hospital in Birmingham, Alabama. He was 35. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American guitarists Category:Disease-related deaths in Alabama Category:Deaths from blood clot Category:Musicians from Florida Category:Musicians from Louisiana
title: Shane Gibson (musician)
